title: Design Activism-Based Architectural Design Technology Project Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Architectural Design Theories and Fundamental Digital Tool Application Experience
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented education emphasizing skill interaction-based learning over theoretical memorization for real-world problem-solving

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more sustainable solutions by applying architectural design principles to real-life cases.
Learners can implement two prototypes using digital design tools and create performance analysis reports.
Learners can evaluate the social impact of architectural technology through team-based projects and present improvement strategies.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
